comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Eleanor, a daughter of U. S. President Thomas Woodrow Wilson, was yet unmarried in April, 1914; on May 7, she was wed to Wilson's Treasury Secretary, William McAdoo. Here are the newlywed McAdoos at Wilson's 35th anniversary college graduation reunion (Class of 1879) at Princeton University, on June 13, 1914:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5558110235/in/photostream/]
